title: PM, ECO secretary general discuss Kashmir, Middle East situation
content:
TASHKENT, Nov 08 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Wednesday held a meeting with Secretary General of Economic Cooperation Organization Ambassador Khusrav Noziri.
In the meeting held on the sidelines of the 16th ECO Summit being held here, they discussed the situation in Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu & Kashmir and Middle East.
They reviewed the recent developments in the ECO especially in the domains of trade, connectivity and economic cooperation.
The ECO secretary general thanked Prime Minister Kakar for Pakistanâ€™s firm support to the ECO and assured him of the commitment of the Secretariat to strengthen trade and connectivity in the region.
